website_summaries.verdict: Designed to help ionize the water; reducing your need for chlorine to get rid of algae in your pool.
pros: Sun's rays ionize the cleaner's copper core, charging the water so now algae can't grow
Effective in both regular and salt water pools
Reduces need for harmful chemicals by up to 85 percent
cons: Cannot "charge" in the sun outside the pool – there is no way to store energy

customer_reviews.title: Ionizers work...this one does not.
customer_reviews.text: June 2, 2019 I had an ionizer that worked, "as promised," for the last 3 Summers, before it stopped working. I replaced it with this one, April 2019, and so far it is making no difference, at all. I cannot tell if it is functioning because there are no indicator lights to let me know it is doing its job. June 8, 2019 I had my levels read at a pool store and they verified that this ionzer is not functioning, at least not enough to make a difference in my pool. Also, any time I select the option to contact DR Global, it won't allow me because it cannot "locate" an order placed by me.
customer_reviews.author: Paul G.

customer_reviews.title: do not buy, does not work
customer_reviews.text: Just floats on top of the water and does its thing, if you have an algae problem, this is not a fast acting solution, you will have to put some work in, all this does is dump blue stuff from the oxidation of the copper rod, it did absolutely nothing for my 15x42 pool, even when my chemicals were correct
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work that well
customer_reviews.text: I still needed to use as much chlorine as in the past. And cleaning it is very messy.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Fischer

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: Have been a pool owner for over 40 yrs. This product did nothing but rapidly increase the copper level of my water. Do not recommend
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Gerald D. Kissel

customer_reviews.title: Crystal Clear Pool
customer_reviews.text: The best product I have found to keep your pool crystal clear with minimal chemical use. I have a 20x40 in ground pool and I cut my chemical use by at least 75%. The cost seems high but the savings on chemicals is easily recouped by using this. Just brush off the copper billet once a week, keep the chlorine level as directed and you'll have a crystal clear pool all summer long.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: No directions or instructions for product use...
customer_reviews.text: I just received the product and tossed it in the pool; I don't have any information yet as to how well it works. But, I'm disappointed that there are no real instructions with the product. What's the little wire brush for? How often do I use it? How do I know when I need to replace the copper anode? How do I contact the seller to ask these questions?
customer_reviews.author: I. B. Krusty

customer_reviews.title: Not really sure about this
customer_reviews.text: Had this in my pool for 4 months. The copper did dissolve, I did still need quite a bit chlorine. I have a large pool and maybe needed 2 of these to be effective. I will float it in the winter when the water is not 90+ degrees. It may have helped
customer_reviews.author: Dusaz

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the negative reviews, I still took the chance and am glad I did. It has kept the pool from algae with less chlorine so far. Water temp is slightly cold but am hoping it will continue to hold in warm temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: Made my pool super foamy. This a known issue for copper contains pool additives.
customer_reviews.author: OkieDoc

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical after being taken previously by this site. But this product actually does what it is supposed do! Very Cool!
customer_reviews.author: Deanna Poulsen

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: It does exactly what it says it will do, I have not had to add any algicide to my pool since installing this
customer_reviews.author: Markem69

customer_reviews.title: this is a miracle product!
customer_reviews.text: it really works! dont forget to clean the copper occasionally and don't let anybody use it as a frisbee!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me, water still not clear after several weeks
customer_reviews.text: Never cleared the water which is still filled with algae.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great product and seller!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and an amazing company to buy from. We reduced the amount of chlorine and keeps the pool clean.
customer_reviews.author: Kendog

customer_reviews.title: GREEEAAAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: USED ALL LAST SUMMER CLEAN WATER ALL SEASON-WORTH EVERY PENNY
customer_reviews.author: kathy thomas

customer_reviews.title: Out of order in 4 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought one in Feb. and does not work in June this year...poor quality
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Cho

customer_reviews.title: Nice idea poorly delivered
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of ionizing the pool to keep it clean instead of using chemicals. However this unit did stain the bottom of the pool seemingly irreversibly without draining it to do an acid wash. Also I tried to get replacement ionizers as they do understandably wear out. The correct ones were no where to be found, are expensive, and the companies web site was vague and elusive concerning this problem. I LOVE good ideas! But this was not one of them as presented,delivered, and serviced!
customer_reviews.author: Truthwinds

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Did not winterize our pool. Purchase this product to clear green algae... wonderful. Highly recommend. Would love to see the manufacturer put out more recommendation reference appropriate copper levels in water I've been trying to keep mine Lower than 0.5. I remove product from pool when levels reached. Using chlorine as sanitizer.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D.

product_meta.title: DR Global Solar Pool Ionizer Kills Algae and Other Organisms Using 85% Less Chlorine 100% Natural Save $300-$500 a Year in Chemicals Year Round Protection
product_meta.description: How your solar pool ionizer works: This solar-powered pool ionizer acts as a algae cleaner for pools from 500 gallons to 35,000 gallons. It uses solar technology to generate a safe, low voltage trickle feed of solar generated electricity to ionize the copper anode. The copper ions help control the growth of algae as well as other harmful microorganisms. While it floats in your pool, copper ions are produced while being exposed to sunlight. Usually, within a period of a few days, a sufficient ion level for pool water purification will be attained. For pools with an extremely heavy presence of of algae growth, it could take up to 21 days to achieve crystal clear water. Your solar pool ionizer helps control pool algae while greatly reducing the amount of chlorine required saving you hundreds of dollars per year. Also helps to lower eye irritation while keeping water sparkling clear. This product includes 1 solar powered ionizer, 1 copper anode, 1 cleaning brush for cleaning the copper core, 1 bottle of test strips, and as an added bonus we include 1 additional copper anode for a total of 2 copper cores Copper anodes usually last about one year so your pool cleaning needs can be covered for at least 2 years.
feature_bullets: Lowers the amount of harsh chemicals needed to keep your pool crystal clear by up to 85%. Year Round Protection

Kills algae before it grows. Simply float this device in your pool and allow the solar panel to capture the sun's rays which will then ionize the copper core making the water an unsuitable environment for algae to live.
WORKS IN ALL POOLS AND SPAS | Chlorinated or Salt Water, Above-Ground, or In-Ground Up To 35,000 Gallons
Reduce Eye And Skin Irritation Caused By Chlorine And Other Chemicals - No More Burning Eyes Or Harsh Chemical Smell
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED !! If Your Not Happy With The Results Or Product, We'll Refund your Purchase (30 Days).
